mapper.select: select A.comment_no as no, A.comment_user_id as userId, B.user_name as userName, A.comment_content as content, A.comment_created_date as createdDate from spring_post_comments A, spring_users B where A.comment_user_id = B.user_id and A.comment_post_no = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into spring_post_comments (comment_no, comment_user_id, comment_content, comment_post_no) values (spring_comments_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{content}, #{postNo})
